0: A few notes on the room I took an ADA accessible room bc it was on a higher floor overlooking the Fountains at the Belagio room 5437
At check out the Senior Guest Service Manager was abrupt and short going as far to state it was somehow our fault for the lack of housekeeping service
The casino itself is a bit on the smaller side and smoky like all casinos
There were some quirks about the room but were taken care of promptly when hotel staff was notified
I would stay here again if the price was right but for 500 a night I feel like they can do a MUCH better job of maintaining the guest rooms
Probably the best pizza you will find on the Strip
Overall I am quite happy with our Cosmo experience
In any event I would stay somewhere else if I came back to Vegas and have heard better things about the Wyn
I was not lucky enough to get a room with a balcony but the view of the strip at night is nice
1: We travel prepared with all our daily living stuff packed in luggage another reason we do not bother housekeeping and they do not bother us
The hotel was even nicer than we were expecting
If you are staying here definitely splurge on the balcony terrace rooms they are well worth it
However at the Cosmopolitan having a terrace to walk on or sit and relax plus the views of the strip and the Belagio fountains is unequaled at any hotel in Las Vegas
We only spent time in the casino but the entire building felt classy
Casino not too busy always something happening
And just as a test before leaving the next day I pulled 3 hairs from my head and left them in the bathtub
If you are organized like I am you can also go buy a whole pizza at Secret Pizza and keep the leftovers in the mini fridge for the balance of your trip
Got to see two rooms as I was upgraded halfway my stay
2: I have been to Vegas several times it is been a while between trips but the lines everywhere were what I would consider ridiculous
The smell lingered for a few hours and then suddenly was gone
If I ever return to this city I am certainly coming back here
The Cosmo truly lives up to it is motto of just the right amount of wrong
20 for a pot of coffee this morning
Went to the Barber Shop to see Super Diamond last night with my 74 year old Mom
When I first walked into my room the TV was on
The gym left much to be desired with a very limited selection of free weights and no view
When does a room include a stunning bath but no bath salts
This was our first time to stay at The Cosmopolitan and it did not disappoint
